description: mounted fan painting: village buildings at C between rocky banks with clusters of full, mature trees; boulders and towering rock formations on either side; figure crossing bridge at LL; rocks in bay in foreground; mountains in background

Nail until January, 1968

title: Country Retreat in Early Summer
